dct_title_s: Town plan of Cagliari. G.S.G.S. no. 4380
dct_description_sm: Projection: Lambet Conical Orthomorphic; Spheroid: Bessel; Origin: 39°30ʹN. 14°00ʹE.; False Coordinates of Origin: 700,000 meters East, 600,000 meters North; Scale Factor: .99906. Ancillary map: "Port details" (1:5,000). Relief shown by form lines. Relief shown by contours and spot heights. Indexed to important buildings and railways. "116305." "4-43." Published by the War Office, 1942, 2nd Edition, 1943. Photolithographed by the Ordinance Survey, 1943. Grid Provisional. AMS 1 United States. Army Map Service. Provisional G.S.G.S. no. 4380 Great Britain. War Office. General Staff. Geographical Section. Provisional G.S.G.S. no. 4380
dct_publisher_sm: Washington, D.C. : Army Map Service, U.S. Army, 1943.
